+000011a0: 204d 6169 6e20 436f 6e63 6570 740a 0a54   Main Concept..T
+000011b0: 6865 2064 6563 6f72 6174 6f72 2060 6874  he decorator `ht
+000011c0: 6d78 6020 7072 6f76 6964 6573 2074 6865  mx` provides the
+000011d0: 2066 6f6c 6c6f 7769 6e67 2068 656c 7065   following helpe
+000011e0: 7273 3a0a 0a2d 2060 7061 7274 6961 6c5f  rs:..- `partial_
+000011f0: 7465 6d70 6c61 7465 5f6e 616d 6560 2054  template_name` T
+00001200: 6865 2070 6172 7469 616c 2074 656d 706c  he partial templ
+00001210: 6174 6520 746f 2075 7365 0a2d 2060 6675  ate to use.- `fu
+00001220: 6c6c 5f74 656d 706c 6174 655f 6e61 6d65  ll_template_name
+00001230: 6020 5468 6520 6675 6c6c 2070 6167 6520  ` The full page 
+00001240: 7465 6d70 6c61 7465 2074 6f20 7573 6520  template to use 
+00001250: 7768 656e 2055 524c 2072 6577 7269 7469  when URL rewriti
+00001260: 6e67 202b 2068 6973 746f 7279 2069 7320  ng + history is 
+00001270: 7573 6564 0a2d 2060 2a5f 7465 6d70 6c61  used.- `*_templa
+00001280: 7465 5f63 6f6e 7374 7275 6374 6f72 6020  te_constructor` 
+00001290: 466f 7220 4452 5920 636f 6465 2c20 696e  For DRY code, in
+000012a0: 2063 6173 6520 7468 6520 6c6f 6769 6320   case the logic 
+000012b0: 746f 2067 6174 6865 7220 616c 6c20 6e65  to gather all ne
+000012c0: 6564 6564 2076 6172 6961 626c 6573 2069  eded variables i
+000012d0: 7320 6e65 6564 6564 206d 756c 7469 706c  s needed multipl
+000012e0: 6520 7469 6d65 730a 0a53 6565 696e 6720  e times..Seeing 
+000012f0: 7468 6573 6520 6172 6775 6d65 6e74 7320  these arguments 
+00001300: 6f6e 6520 6d69 6768 7420 6173 6b20 7468  one might ask th
+00001310: 656d 7365 6c76 6573 3a20 5768 7920 616c  emselves: Why al
+00001320: 6c20 7468 6573 6520 7061 7261 6d65 7465  l these paramete
+00001330: 7273 3f20 5468 6520 616e 7377 6572 2069  rs? The answer i
+00001340: 7320 616e 206f 7069 6e69 6f6e 6174 6564  s an opinionated
+00001350: 2074 616b 6520 6f6e 2068 6f77 2074 6f20   take on how to 
+00001360: 6465 7369 676e 206d 6f64 756c 6172 2065  design modular e
+00001370: 6e64 706f 696e 7473 2077 6974 2070 6172  ndpoints wit par
+00001380: 7469 616c 7320 616e 6420 7572 6c2d 7265  tials and url-re
+00001390: 7772 6974 696e 6720 7375 7070 6f72 743a  writing support:
+000013a0: 0a0a 5468 6520 6964 6561 2062 6568 696e  ..The idea behin
+000013b0: 6420 4661 7374 4150 492d 4854 4d58 2069  d FastAPI-HTMX i
+000013c0: 7320 746f 206d 6169 6e74 6169 6e20 6120  s to maintain a 
+000013d0: 6d6f 6475 6c61 7220 7374 7275 6374 7572  modular structur
+000013e0: 6520 696e 2074 6865 2061 7070 2061 6e64  e in the app and
+000013f0: 2077 6974 6820 7468 6520 656e 6470 6f69   with the endpoi
+00001400: 6e74 732e 2053 696d 696c 6172 2074 6f20  nts. Similar to 
+00001410: 6120 5245 5354 2041 5049 2077 6974 6820  a REST API with 
+00001420: 6120 5b53 5041 5d28 6874 7470 733a 2f2f  a [SPA](https://
+00001430: 6465 7665 6c6f 7065 722e 6d6f 7a69 6c6c  developer.mozill
+00001440: 612e 6f72 672f 656e 2d55 532f 646f 6373  a.org/en-US/docs
+00001450: 2f47 6c6f 7373 6172 792f 5350 4129 2e20  /Glossary/SPA). 
+00001460: 5468 6973 2077 6179 2074 6865 2066 726f  This way the fro
+00001470: 6e74 656e 6420 6361 6e20 6265 206d 6f64  ntend can be mod
+00001480: 756c 6172 2061 7320 7765 6c6c 2e20 5468  ular as well. Th
